nodes.text: The Veerpal Squadron was a squadron of the Imperial Alpha-class Xg-1 Star Wings during the height of the Galactic Civil War. Under the command of Lieutenant Noble Calder, they escorted the Star Galleon-class frigate Aremin over the planet of Redcap. Here, they engaged the deluded smuggler Toob Ancher in a Z-95 Headhunter.
